WITH T AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SA.AJMT_NO DESC) AS RNUM, G.GDS_CODE AS GDS_CODE_G, G.GDS_NM, G.GDS_TYPE, G.UNIT_NM, G.REG_YMD, G.MBR_ID, S.BZENT_NO, --AS BZENT_NO_S, S.SF_STOCK_QTY, S.NTSL_TYPE, SA.AJMT_NO, --AS AJMT_NO_SA, SA.AJMT_TYPE, SA.QTY, --AS QTY_SA, SA.AJMT_YMD, SA.AJMT_RSN FROM GDS G INNER JOIN STOCK S ON G.GDS_CODE = S.GDS_CODE INNER JOIN STOCK_AJMT SA ON S.GDS_CODE = SA.GDS_CODE AND S.BZENT_NO = SA.BZENT_NO AND SA.BZENT_NO = (SELECT B.BZENT_NO FROM BZENT B WHERE B.MBR_ID = #{mbrId}) WHERE 1=1
) SELECT T.* FROM T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN ((#{currentPage} - 1) * #{size}) + 1 AND #{currentPage} * #{size}
